com.st.st25sdk

Interface FastTransferModeInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FastTransferModeCommand, ST25DVTag, ST25TV04KPTag, ST25TV16KTag, ST25TV64KTag, ST25TVHighDensityTag, ST25TVPTag

    public interface FastTransferModeInterface
    Defines the common methods to manage MailBox feature (Fast Transfer Mode feature)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] fastReadMailboxMessage(int mbAddress, int size)
      Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location using Fast Read Message command.
      byte[] fastReadMailboxMessage(int mbAddress, int size, byte flag)
      Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location using Fast Read Message command.
      int fastReadMailboxMessageLength()
      Returns (MailBox message length - 1) using Fast Read Message Length command.
      byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(byte[] buffer)
      Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command.
      byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(int size, byte[] buffer)
      Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command.
      byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(int size, byte[] buffer, byte flag)
      Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command.

      Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location.

    • Method Detail

      • writeMailboxMessage

        byte writeMailboxMessage(byte[] buffer)
                  throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Parameters:
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeMailboxMessage

        byte writeMailboxMessage(int size,
                         byte[] buffer)
                  throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeMailboxMessage

        byte writeMailboxMessage(int size,
                         byte[] buffer,
                         byte flag)
                  throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in mailbox
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • readMailboxMessage

        byte[] readMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                          int size)
                   throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • readMailboxMessage

        byte[] readMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                          int size,
                          byte flag)
                   throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • readMailboxMessageLength

        int readMailboxMessageLength()
                      throws STException
        Returns (MailBox message length - 1). Add 1 to the result to get the actual mailbox message length. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Returns:
        MailBox message length minus 1 byte (so that 0xFF matches the max size of MAILBOX_SIZE bytes)
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastWriteMailboxMessage

        byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(byte[] buffer)
                      throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Parameters:
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastWriteMailboxMessage

        byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(int size,
                             byte[] buffer)
                      throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastWriteMailboxMessage

        byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(int size,
                             byte[] buffer,
                             byte flag)
                      throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in mailbox
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastReadMailboxMessage

        byte[] fastReadMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                              int size)
                       throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location using Fast Read Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • fastReadMailboxMessage

        byte[] fastReadMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                              int size,
                              byte flag)
                       throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location using Fast Read Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • fastReadMailboxMessageLength

        int fastReadMailboxMessageLength()
                          throws STException
        Returns (MailBox message length - 1) using Fast Read Message Length command. Add 1 to the result to get the actual mailbox message length. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Returns:
        MailBox message length minus 1 byte (so that 0xFF matches the max size of MAILBOX_SIZE bytes)
        Throws:
        STException
